content.summary: Software Engineer with experience in automating workflows using Python APIs and developing robust dashboards. Skilled in web development, machine learning, and data analysis. Demonstrated leadership skills through team management and event organization.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Automated Odoo workflows via Python APIs, optimizing billing, journal entries, price tracking, and expense management
Engineered a robust Appsmith dashboard in JavaScript, analyzing 20k+ records for actionable insights and decision-making
Developed a Vue.js app with PocketBase, enabling seamless product image capture, data entry, real-time Odoo integration

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Expected 15% user engagement through RAG model to propose both similar and complementary items
Projected to provide the personalized product suggestions in <60 sec through prompt and image inputs
Automated communication thread comprehension, reducing time/thread & markedly improving efficiency

projects.title: Music Recommendation System
objectives: Developed a music recommendation system using content-based filtering on Spotify Database
contributions: Implemented Cosine Similarity & Euclidean Distance for song similarity, recommended popular tunes with sorting algo

projects.title: Analysis of a Residential Structure
objectives: Implemented Structural Design principles on G+3 model, enhancing learning through optimized beams, columns & slabs
contributions: Utilized ETABS software to analyze and validate designs, aligning with Indian Standard 456-2000 through hand calculations

skills: Tools: MS Excel, MS Powerpoint, Word, PowerBI, Tableau, Azure DevOps, Postman

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Awarded an AA grade (top 16%) in the course Introduction to Electrical and Electronic Circuits
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Successfully completed Python course on Learner space 2021, conducted by UGAC, IIT Bombay
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Spearheaded a 2-tier team of 100+ students for building and maintaining the website and various events
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Pioneered and launched the 1st ever accommodation portal with 1.5M+ hits
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Successfully completed the yearlong training in Weight-lifting under National Sports Organisation, IITB
